EmailTemplate.name: 202011_Global_Email_IMU_Thank you_ILMF Webinar_JRD.Email #1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the ILMF webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for our webinar on "How Inertial Navigation and Post-processing Make Surveying/Mapping More Profitable."
If you missed the webinar or would like to rewatch it, you can download it here.
If you'd like to connect and talk about your application to see how we can help, you can contact me <[[mailto:jon.thorland@honeywell.com]]> or my colleagues directly:
- Jill Brown, Americas <[[mailto:jill.brown@honeywell.com]]> - Darren Fisher, EMEA & APAC <[[mailto:darren.fisher@honeywell.com]]> - Vandit Bhurat, India <[[mailto:Vandit.bhurat@honeywell.com]]>
And, if you'd like to browse our portfolio of high-performance IMUs and inertial navigation systems, you can find them here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/sensors/honeywell-hguide-inertial-sensors-and-navigators]]>.
We look forward to speaking with you about how we can help solve your next challenge.
Sincerely,
Jon Thorland THE HGUIDE CONTENT HUB The Advantages vs. Disadvantages of an Inertial Navigation System
We surveyed our HGuide inertial navigation engineers with more than 100 years of experience combined between them to help you better understand the advantages and disadvantages of using an inertial navigation system.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/inertial-navigation-system-infographic]]>
5 Things to Consider Before Buying an Inertial Navigation System
There’s a lot of factors to consider before buying an inertial navigation system and more importantly, designing it into your application. Fortunately, we’ve compiled years of customer feedback in a quick and easy-to-read.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/consider-inertial-navigation-system-infographic]]> How to Enhance Point Clouds Using Honeywell’s HGuide n580
For companies in surveying and mapping, generating accurate point clouds is critical when creating mapping systems. Creating them real-time reduces the overhead needed in post-processing...
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/enhance-point-clouds-with-hguide-n580]]>
How to Synchronize an HGuide n580 With a Velodyne HDL-32E or VLP-16
Users needing to collect and process LiDAR data from mobile applications need to know the location of the scanner to anchor the data logged and subsequent 3D images.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/synchronize-hguide-n580-with-velodyne-hdl-32e-vlp-16]]> HGuide Customer Support
Getting technical support across any of our HGuide products has never been easier. To access our FAQs or to speak with one of our applications engineers, visit our new HGuide Support page.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/hguide-customer-support]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
